name: L'Academy Schools
description: L’Academy offers infant, toddler, and preschool programs designed to support each stage of early childhood development. - Language Immersion: Children learn Mandarin or Spanish daily, building bilingual skills and cultural awareness. - Love and Logic: Teachers lead with empathy, fostering kindness, respect, and emotional growth. - Little Leaders: Through creativity, collaboration, and exploration, children grow into confident thinkers. - Luscious Meals: Provide fresh, nutritious meals and snacks

address: 1868 Van Ness Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94109
